channel.title: Prestige not giving points
channel.description: I used this tutorial http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/492635-pi-prestige-system.html to add prestige. The prestige system seems to be working, except it doesn't give any points rewards. If possible I need to add a working prestige system with an xp bonus possibly per prestige as well?

item.title: Prestige not giving points
item.dc:creator: @loganownsyou loganownsyou
item.description:
@loganownsyou wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:6, topic:539987”][quote author=loganownsyou link=topic=658837.msg4406970#msg4406970 date=1392307287]
What I did fixed the points being added (sorta), but now, my prestige jumps straight to 10 (maxed) everytime you prestige. wtf is going on. I recommend nobody use this tutorial because it’s severely bugged and i’ve spent several days trying to perfect it.
[/quote]
How can you perfect it without the required knowledge? It works fine for me.[/quote]

keyword being trying haha. I wasn’t recieving points, spelling errors and a few other minor things.

Read full topic

maybe you have to add that in dialogue handler or something

item.title: Prestige not giving points
item.dc:creator: @loganownsyou loganownsyou
item.description:
@loganownsyou wrote:

The system and points are added along with the shop, but when i prestige i don’t recieve the point rewards is my problem, but thanks

Dialogue handler
case 9004:

[code] c.isMaxed();
if(c.maxed) {
for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 1) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot prestige if you have any equipment on you!”);
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
return;
}
}

			// start of level resetting! gfx 142 546
			c.getPA().resetLevels();
			c.gfx0(142);
			c.startAnimation(546);
			if(c.prestige < 10){	
			c.prestige += 1;
			c.maxed = false;
				if (c.prestige == 1 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 38;
				} else if (c.prestige == 2 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 39;
				} else if (c.prestige == 3 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 40;
				} else if (c.prestige == 4 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 41;
				} else if (c.prestige == 5 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 42;
				} else if (c.prestige == 6 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 43;
				} else if (c.prestige == 7 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 44;
				} else if (c.prestige == 8 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 45;
				} else if (c.prestige == 9 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 46;
				} else if (c.prestige == 10 && c.playerRights == 0) {
					c.playerTitle = 47;
				} else {
					if (c.playerRights >= 0 && c.prestige == 10) {
				c.sendMessage("You Seem To Be Max Prestige.");
				}
				if (c.prestige == 1 && c.playerRights == 3) {
					c.playerTitle = 28;
				} else if (c.prestige > 1 && c.playerRights == 3) {
					c.playerTitle += 0;
				if (c.playerTitle ==  47 && c.playerRights == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You Seem To Be Max Prestige, You Do Not Receive A New Title.");
				}
				if (c.prestige == 1 && c.playerRights == 4) {
				c.sendMessage("Please Ask Owner If You Would Like To Change Your Title");
				c.sendMessage("From Donator || Super Donator || Extreme Donator To Presting (Rank)");
				}
				}
			}
		}[/code]

playerassistant.java

[code]
public void setPrestigeReward(){
if(c.prestige > 1){
c.prestigePoint += 2;
c.sendMessage(“You have gained 2 prestige points!”)
return;
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You are already prestige 10, which is max prestige!”);
c.prestige = 10;
return;
}
}

public void resetLevels(){
c.playerXP[0] = getXPForLevel(1)+5;
c.playerXP[1] = getXPForLevel(1)+5;
c.playerXP[2] = getXPForLevel(1)+5;
c.playerXP[3] = getXPForLevel(10)+5;
c.playerXP[4] = getXPForLevel(1)+5;
c.playerXP[5] = getXPForLevel(1)+5;
c.playerXP[6] = getXPForLevel(1)+5;
c.playerXP[21] = getXPForLevel(1)+5;
c.playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]);
c.playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]);
c.playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]);
c.playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
c.playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]);
c.playerLevel[21] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[21]);
refreshSkill(0);
refreshSkill(1);
refreshSkill(2);
refreshSkill(3);
refreshSkill(4);
refreshSkill(5);
refreshSkill(6);
refreshSkill(21);
[/code]

Maybe i need to add c.getPA().setPrestigeReward(); into diallogue handler like this?:

// start of level resetting! gfx 142 546 c.getPA().resetLevels(); [b] c.getPA().setPrestigeReward(); [/b] c.gfx0(142); c.startAnimation(546); if(c.prestige < 10){ c.prestige += 1; c.maxed = false;

Read full topic
